title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4243.28 - Generally
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4243.28 - Generally

State Regulations

The corporation may provide, within available
appropriations, loans, loan guarantees and grants, including, without
limitation, interest subsidy grants, to eligible recipients for commercial area
development financing projects. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4243.28

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
